cdk:synth: generate cloudformation template for all stacks [stage]
cdk:bootstrap: bootstrap CDK deployment (only required once before first deploy to new AWS account?)
cdk:deploy: build and deploy all CDK stacks to stage ``npm run cdk:deploy <stage>``
cdk:destroy: delete all CDK stacks on stage ``npm run cdk:destroy <stage>``
sdk:rds:ls: list RDS dev db instances ``npm run sdk:rds:ls <stage>``
test:watch: run all tests in watch mode
